raw_body: SHAMAL PREETHIE COORAY (nee BANDARATILLEKE) – Wife of Salilanath (Nath) Cooray (US Embassy London),​ much loved mother of Rukshan & Serena,​ sister of Niranjan,​ Malith,​ Roshanara Jobsz,​ Asho,​ Kumar,​ Kumarie Jenkins,​ mother-in-law of Sean Hilllier,​ adored grandma of Mia,​ passed away peacefully in United Kingdom. Service at Sudbury Baptist Church (UK) at 12.00 noon on July 11th,​ Cremation at Ruislip Crematorium (UK) at 2.00 p.m.042306
